resources.string:
"Quiz App" helps you strengthen your knowledge in school subjects. The app includes tests in the following subjects:

Physics: Mechanics, thermophysics, electromagnetism, optics, and other physics concepts.

History: World history, history of people, history of states, history of wars, and more.
Mathematics: Algebra, geometry, number theory, functions, calculus, and more.

Literature: Logical and philosophical foundations of literature, history of poets and writers, world literature, folk literature, and more.

Chemistry: Chemistry of atoms and molecules, thermodynamics, chemical reactions, chemical elements and their properties, chemical formulas, and more.

English: Speaking, writing rules, translation, and many other topics.

The app offers the following useful features:

Ability for users to take tests by form.
Separate tests for each subject.
Save results and monitor student progress.
"Quiz App" provides students with general educational materials in scientific subjects and offers the opportunity to learn, take tests, and assess their knowledge levels.
